text:
Christopher Leonard is a financial journalist and writer. He was long-listed for the Financial Times and McKinsey Business Book of the Year Award. He was a Schmidt Family Foundation Fellow at the New America Foundation. He is a notable author, because he created a book subject to multiple reviews, in the "New York Times, Financial Times", and "The New Yorker".
Life.
He was a reporter with the "Associated Press." His work appeared in "Fortune", "The New Republic", and "ProPublica".
